posts.post_content:
Anybody have one for sale out there?
For like $300ish?

I realize it would have to be the cruddiest (technical term for PSA 0.5+ grade) example extant, but just for giggles, I thought I'd ask.

Ever hear the song Dream Weaver.  I have been searching for years with no luck.  Good luck.

Kmac

it's just that every one I've ever seen has cost $1200+

But, it's ok to dream, and if you don't ask you'll never know!:D

Don't worry...I know you're looking too...so if I find two for $600, I'll certainly pass along the second one your way.

Likewise, if I find an extra will let you know.  Still looking for Saier at a reasonable price.  Same story as Miller on the 1200.00 plus.  Rarely see either card.

Kmac

If the last Heritage auction is any indication, you guys may get your wish - Irving Lewis (SGC 40) went for $1900 + juice, I think ...  well down from previous sales.  Maybe it was a fluke - who knows.

Good luck!
--
Mike
